name: The Conversion of Saint Paul
description: The Conversion of Saint Paul; Taddeo Zuccaro (Italian, 1529 - 1566); Italy; 1558 / 1559 - 1566; Pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash, black chalk, and lead white heightening on blue paper; 26.2 x 39.5 cm (10 5/16 x 15 9/16 in.); 91.GA.13; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Conversion of Saint Paul
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash, black chalk, and lead white heightening on blue paper
